verses.verse: וַיְכֻלּ֛וּ <WH3615> were finished הַשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> Thus the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צְבָאָֽם׃ <WH6635> and all the host of them

וַיְכַ֤ל <WH3615> ended אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> And on the seventh מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> his work אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he had made וַיִּשְׁבֹּת֙ <WH7673> and he rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> on the seventh מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> from all his work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> which he had made

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> the seventh וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH6942> and sanctified אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> it because ב֤וֹ שָׁבַת֙ <WH7673> that in it he had rested מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלַאכְתּ֔וֹ <WH4399> from all his work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּרָ֥א <WH1254> created אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> which God לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> and made פ

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These תוֹלְד֧וֹת <WH8435> [are] the generations הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> of the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and of the earth בְּהִבָּֽרְאָ֑ם <WH1254> when they were created בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> in the day עֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> made יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> and the heavens

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and every שִׂ֣יחַ <WH7880> And every plant הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field טֶ֚רֶם <WH2962> before יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> it was in the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> and every herb הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field טֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> before יִצְמָ֑ח <WH6779> it grew כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> had not הִמְטִ֜יר <WH4305> caused it to rain יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> a man אַ֔יִן <WH369> and [there was] not לַֽעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to till אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the ground

וְאֵ֖ד <WH108> a mist יַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> But there went up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְהִשְׁקָ֖ה <WH8248> and watered אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole פְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the whole face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the ground

וַיִּיצֶר֩ <WH3335> formed יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָ֗ם <WH120> man עָפָר֙ <WH6083> [of] the dust מִן־ <WH4480> of הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the ground וַיִּפַּ֥ח <WH5301> and breathed בְּאַפָּ֖יו <WH639> into his nostrils נִשְׁמַ֣ת <WH5397> the breath חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> and man לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul חַיָּֽה׃ <WH2416> became a living

וַיִּטַּ֞ע <WH5193> planted יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God גַּן־ <WH1588> a garden בְעֵ֖דֶן <WH5731> in Eden מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> eastward וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> he put שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָצָֽר׃ <WH3335> he had formed

וַיַּצְמַ֞ח <WH6779> to grow יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God מִן־ <WH4480> And out הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the ground כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֛ץ <WH6086> every tree נֶחְמָ֥ד <WH2530> that is pleasant לְמַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> to the sight וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> and good לְמַאֲכָ֑ל <WH3978> for food וְעֵ֤ץ <WH6086> the tree הַֽחַיִּים֙ <WH2416> of life בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> also in the midst הַגָּ֔ן <WH1588> of the garden וְעֵ֕ץ <WH6086> and the tree הַדַּ֖עַת <WH1847> of knowledge ט֥וֹב <WH2896> of good וָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> and evil

וְנָהָרּ֙ <WH5104> And a river יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out מֵעֵ֔דֶן <WH5731> of Eden לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <WH8248> to water אֶת־ <WH853> הַגָּ֑ן <WH1588> the garden וּמִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there יִפָּרֵ֔ד <WH6504> and from thence it was parted וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> and became לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> and became into four רָאשִֽׁים׃ <WH7218> heads

שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> The name הָֽאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> of the first פִּישׁ֑וֹן <WH6376> [is] Pison ה֣וּא <WH1931> that הַסֹּבֵ֗ב <WH5437> [is] it which compasseth אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the whole land הַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <WH2341> of Havilah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there הַזָּהָֽב׃ <WH2091> [there is] gold

וּֽזֲהַ֛ב <WH2091> And the gold הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> land הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> of that ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [is] good שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> are there הַבְּדֹ֖לַח <WH916> there [is] bdellium וְאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stone הַשֹּֽׁהַם׃ <WH7718> and the onyx

וְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> And the name הַנָּהָ֥ר <WH5104> river הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> of the second גִּיח֑וֹן <WH1521> [is] Gihon ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הַסּוֹבֵ֔ב <WH5437> the same [is] it that compasseth אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the whole land כּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3568> of Ethiopia

וְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> And the name הַנָּהָ֤ר <WH5104> river הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> of the third חִדֶּ֔קֶל <WH2313> [is] Hiddekel ה֥וּא <WH1931> it הַֽהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> that [is] it which goeth toward קִדְמַ֣ת <WH6926> the east אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְהַנָּהָ֥ר <WH5104> river הָֽרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> And the fourth ה֥וּא <WH1931> he פְרָֽת׃ <WH6578> [is] Euphrates

וַיִּקַּ֛ח <WH3947> took יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> the man וַיַּנִּחֵ֣הוּ <WH3240> and put him בְגַן־ <WH1588> into the garden עֵ֔דֶן <WH5731> of Eden לְעָבְדָ֖הּ <WH5647> to dress וּלְשָׁמְרָֽהּ׃ <WH8104> it and to keep

וַיְצַו֙ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God עַל־ <WH5921> and הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> the man לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מִכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> any עֵֽץ־ <WH6086> Of every tree הַגָּ֖ן <WH1588> of the garden אָכֹ֥ל <WH398> thou mayest freely תֹּאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> eat

וּמֵעֵ֗ץ <WH6086> But of the tree הַדַּ֙עַת֙ <WH1847> of the knowledge ט֣וֹב <WH2896> of good וָרָ֔ע <WH7451> and evil לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> thou shalt not eat מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at כִּ֗י <WH3588> in בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> of it for in the day אֲכָלְךָ֥ <WH398> that thou eatest מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at מ֥וֹת <WH4191> thereof thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֛וֹב <WH2896> [It is] not good הֱי֥וֹת <WH1961> should be הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> that the man לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> to be alone אֶֽעֱשֶׂהּ־ <WH6213> alone I will make לּ֥וֹ עֵ֖זֶר <WH5828> him an help meet כְּנֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5048> suitable

וַיִּצֶר֩ <WH3335> formed יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> God מִן־ <WH4480> Out הָֽאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> And out of the ground כָּל־ <WH3605> every חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and every fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the air וַיָּבֵא֙ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אָדָ֔ם <WH120> [them] unto Adam לִרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> to see מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> what he would call ל֑וֹ וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִקְרָא־ <WH7121> called ל֧וֹ הָֽאָדָ֛ם <WH120> them and whatsoever Adam נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> every living ה֥וּא <WH1931> that שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [was] the name thereof

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> gave הָֽאָדָ֜ם <WH120> And Adam שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> names לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> to all cattle וּלְע֣וֹף <WH5775> and to the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the air וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> every חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and to every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וּלְאָדָ֕ם <WH120> but for Adam לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not מָצָ֥א <WH4672> there was not found עֵ֖זֶר <WH5828> an help meet כְּנֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5048> suitable

וַיַּפֵּל֩ <WH5307> to fall יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> God תַּרְדֵּמָ֛ה <WH8639> a deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> the man וַיִּישָׁ֑ן <WH3462> and he slept וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> and he took אַחַת֙ <WH259> one מִצַּלְעֹתָ֔יו <WH6763> of his ribs וַיִּסְגֹּ֥ר <WH5462> and closed up בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> the flesh תַּחְתֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH8478> place

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> made יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> God אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַצֵּלָ֛ע <WH6763> And the rib אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> had taken מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> from man לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> he a woman וַיְבִאֶ֖הָ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> her unto the man

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said הָֽאָדָם֒ <WH120> And Adam זֹ֣את <WH2063> This הַפַּ֗עַם <WH6471> [is] now עֶ֚צֶם <WH6106> bone מֵֽעֲצָמַ֔י <WH6106> of my bones וּבָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> and flesh מִבְּשָׂרִ֑י <WH1320> of my flesh לְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> she יִקָּרֵ֣א <WH7121> shall be called אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> Woman כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> out of Man לֻֽקֳחָה־ <WH3947> was taken זֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> because she

עַל־ <WH5921> For כֵּן֙ <WH3651> Therefore יַֽעֲזָב־ <WH5800> leave אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> shall a man אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> and his mother וְדָבַ֣ק <WH1692> and shall cleave בְּאִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> unto his wife וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> shall become לְבָשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and they shall be one

וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become שְׁנֵיהֶם֙ <WH8147> And they were both עֲרוּמִּ֔ים <WH6174> naked הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> the man וְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> and his wife וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> and were not יִתְבֹּשָֽׁשׁוּ׃ <WH954> and were not ashamed
